verses.verse: Nevertheless <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H4155>dimness<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be such <S%H834>as<s%> was in her <S%H4164>vexation,<s%> <S%H6256>when<s%> at the <S%H7223>first<s%> he lightly <S%H7043>afflicted<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and <S%H314>afterward<s%> did more grievously <S%H3513>afflict<s%> her by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> in <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H1980>walked<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H216>light:<s%> they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the shadow of <S%H6757>death,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them hath the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H5050>shined.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1431>increased<s%> the <S%H8057>joy:<s%> they <S%H8055>joy<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee according to the <S%H8057>joy<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and <S%H834>as<s%> men <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> when they <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thou hast <S%H2865>broken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of his <S%H5448>burden,<s%> and the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of his <S%H7926>shoulder,<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5065>oppressor,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5430>battle<s%> of the <S%H5431>warrior<s%> is with confused <S%H7494>noise,<s%> and <S%H8071>garments<s%> <S%H1556>rolled<s%> in <S%H1818>blood;<s%> but this shall <S%H1961>be<s%> with <S%H8316>burning<s%> and <S%H3980>fuel<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> unto us a <S%H3206>child<s%> is <S%H3205>born,<s%> unto us a <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5414>given:<s%> and the <S%H4951>government<s%> shall be <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7926>shoulder:<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H6382>Wonderful,<s%> <S%H3289>Counselor,<s%> The <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> The <S%H5703>everlasting<s%> <S%H1>Father,<s%> The <S%H8269>Prince<s%> of <S%H7965>Peace.<s%>

Of the <S%H4766>increase<s%> of his <S%H4951>government<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> there shall be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7093>end,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> to <S%H3559>order<s%> it, and to <S%H5582>establish<s%> it with <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and with <S%H6666>justice<s%> from <S%H4480>henceforth<s%> <S%H6258><s%> even <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%> The <S%H7068>zeal<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> will <S%H6213>perform<s%> <S%H2063>this.<s%>
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> into <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and it hath <S%H5307>lighted<s%> upon <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3045>know,<s%> even <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> that <S%H559>say<s%> in the <S%H1346>pride<s%> and <S%H1433>stoutness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart,<s%>

The <S%H3843>bricks<s%> are fallen <S%H5307>down,<s%> but we will <S%H1129>build<s%> with hewn <S%H1496>stones:<s%> the <S%H8256>sycamores<s%> are cut <S%H1438>down,<s%> but we will <S%H2498>change<s%> them into <S%H730>cedars.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall set <S%H7682>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> of <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, and join his enemies <S%H5526>together;<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H341><s%>

The <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H4480>before,<s%> <S%H6924><s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H4480>behind;<s%> <S%H268><s%> and they shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H3605>open<s%> <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> turned <S%H7725>away,<s%> but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H5750>still.<s%>

For the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>turneth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> him that <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> them, <S%H3808>neither<s%> do they <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H4480>Israel<s%> <S%H3478><s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H2180>tail,<s%> <S%H3712>branch<s%> and <S%H100>rush,<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H2205>ancient<s%> and <S%H5375>honorable,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is the <S%H7218>head;<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that <S%H3384>teacheth<s%> <S%H8267>lies,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is the <S%H2180>tail.<s%>
For the <S%H833>leaders<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> cause them to <S%H8582>err;<s%> and they that are <S%H833>led<s%> of them are <S%H1104>destroyed.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8055>joy<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their young <S%H970>men,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on their <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and <S%H490>widows:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> is a <S%H2611>hypocrite<s%> and an <S%H7489>evildoer,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H5039>folly.<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> turned <S%H7725>away,<s%> but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H5750>still.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> <S%H1197>burneth<s%> as the <S%H784>fire:<s%> it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns,<s%> and shall <S%H3341>kindle<s%> in the <S%H5442>thickets<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest,<s%> and they shall mount <S%H55>up<s%> like the lifting <S%H1348>up<s%> of <S%H6227>smoke.<s%>

Through the <S%H5678>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6272>darkened,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H3980>fuel<s%> of the <S%H784>fire:<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H2550>spare<s%> <S%H413><s%> his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And he shall <S%H1504>snatch<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and be <S%H7456>hungry;<s%> and he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the left <S%H8040>hand,<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7646>satisfied:<s%> they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his own arm: <S%H2220><s%>

Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> shall be <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> turned <S%H7725>away,<s%> but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H5750>still.<s%>
